title: Apple is now assembling the iPhone 13 in Brazil, but not the iPhone 13 mini
content:
Although the vast majority of Apple products are assembled in China, Apple also uses some of Foxconn’s facilities in countries like Brazil and India to assemble iPhones. Now the company has started assembling the iPhone 13 in Brazil, but there’s a catch – it seems that the iPhone 13 mini will not have a local production.

more…

The post Apple is now assembling the iPhone 13 in Brazil, but not the iPhone 13 mini appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple has started assembling the iPhone 13 in Brazil, but there's a catch – iPhone 13 mini will not have a local production.
